use_motion_prediction_hints.description: When set to true, smaller motion packets will be sent during drop packet intervals, resulting in the same amount of packets being sent as without optimizations but with much less data being sent. This should be used when actors are travelling very quickly or teleporting to prevent visual oddities.

JA.description: Defines this entity's ability to trade with players.

convert_trades_economy.description: Determines when the mob transforms, if the trades should be converted when the new mob has a economy_trade_table. When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.
convert_trades_economy.title: Convert Trades Economy

BAD.title: Genetics 1.8.0
BAD.description: Defines the way a mob's genes and alleles are passed on to it's offspring, and how those traits manifest in the child. Compatible parent genes are crossed together, the alleles are handed down from the parents to the child, and any matching genetic variants fire off JSON events to modify the child and express the traits.

mutation_rate.description: Chance that an allele will be replaced with a random one instead of the parent's allele during birth.
mutation_rate.title: TODO Title

items.description: The list of genes that this entity has and will cross with a partner during breeding.

allele_range.description: The range of positive integer allele values for this gene. Spawned mobs will have a random number in this range assigned to them.

range_min.description: Lower bound of the allele values for this gene.

range_max.description: Upper bound of the allele values for this gene.

genetic_variants.description: The list of genetic variants for this gene. These check for particular allele combinations and fire events when all of them are satisfied.

birth_event.description: Event to run when this mob is created and matches the above allele conditions.

both_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare both the mob's main and hidden alleles with this value for a match with both. Can also be a range of integers.

either_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare both the mob's main and hidden alleles with this value for a match with either. Can also be a range of integers.

hidden_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare the mob's hidden allele with this value for a match. Can also be a range of integers.

main_allele.description: If this value is non-negative, compare the mob's main allele with this value for a match. Can also be a range of integers.

When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

breaks_blocks.description: If true, the explosion will destroy blocks in the explosion radius.
breaks_blocks.title: Breaks Blocks

causes_fire.description: If true, blocks in the explosion radius will be set on fire.
causes_fire.title: Causes Fire

destroy_affected_by_griefing.description: If true, whether the explosion breaks blocks is affected by the mob griefing game rule.
destroy_affected_by_griefing.title: Destroy Affected By Griefing

fire_affected_by_griefing.description: If true, whether the explosion causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule.
fire_affected_by_griefing.title: Fire Affected By Griefing

fuse_length.description: The range for the random amount of time the fuse will be lit before exploding, a negative value means the explosion will be immediate.
fuse_length.title: Fuse Length

fuse_lit.description: If true, the fuse is already lit when this component is added to the entity.
fuse_lit.title: Fuse Lit

max_resistance.description: A blocks explosion resistance will be capped at this value when an explosion occurs.
max_resistance.title: Max Resistance

power.description: The radius of the explosion in blocks and the amount of damage the explosion deals.
power.title: Power

DJG.description: Allows the entity to be a thrown entity.
DJG.title: Projectile 1.12.0

angle_offset.description: Determines the angle at which the projectile is thrown
angle_offset.title: Angle Offset

catch_fire.description: If true, the entity hit will be set on fire
catch_fire.title: Catch Fire

crit_particle_on_hurt.description: If true, the projectile will produce additional particles when a critical hit happens
crit_particle_on_hurt.title: Crit Particle On Hurt

destroy_on_hurt.description: If true, this entity will be destroyed when hit
destroy_on_hurt.title: Destroy On Hurt

filter.description: Entity Definitions defined here can't be hurt by the projectile
filter.title: Filter

fire_affected_by_griefing.description: If true, whether the projectile causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule
fire_affected_by_griefing.title: Fire Affected By Griefing

gravity.description: The gravity applied to this entity when thrown. The higher the value, the faster the entity falls
gravity.title: Gravity

hit_sound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile hits something
hit_sound.title: Hit Sound

homing.description: If true, the projectile homes in to the nearest entity
homing.title: Homing

inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in air
inertia.title: Inertia

is_dangerous.description: If true, the projectile will be treated as dangerous to the players
is_dangerous.title: Is Dangerous

knockback.description: If true, the projectile will knock back the entity it hits
knockback.title: Knockback

lightning.description: If true, the entity hit will be struck by lightning
lightning.title: Lightning

liquid_inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in water
liquid_inertia.title: Liquid Inertia

multiple_targets.description: If true, the projectile can hit multiple entities per flight
multiple_targets.title: Multiple Targets

offset.description: The offset from the entity's anchor where the projectile will spawn
offset.title: Offset

on_fire_time.description: Time in seconds that the entity hit will be on fire for
on_fire_time.title: On Fire Time

duration.description: UNDOCUMENTATED
duration.title: UNDOCUMENTATED

potion_effect.description: Defines the effect the arrow will apply to the entity it hits
potion_effect.title: Potion Effect

power.description: Determines the velocity of the projectile
power.title: Power

reflect_on_hurt.description: If true, this entity will be reflected back when hit
reflect_on_hurt.title: Reflect On Hurt

semi_random_diff_damage.description: If true, damage will be randomized based on damage and speed
semi_random_diff_damage.title: Semi Random Diff Damage

shoot_sound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile is shot
shoot_sound.title: Shoot Sound

shoot_target.description: If true, the projectile will be shot towards the target of the entity firing it
shoot_target.title: Shoot Target

should_bounce.description: If true, the projectile will bounce upon hit
should_bounce.title: Should Bounce

splash_potion.description: If true, the projectile will be treated like a splash potion
splash_potion.title: Splash Potion

splash_range.description: Radius in blocks of the 'splash' effect
splash_range.title: Splash Range

uncertainty_base.description: The base accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier
uncertainty_base.title: Uncertainty Base

uncertainty_multiplier.description: Determines how much difficulty affects accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier
uncertainty_multiplier.title: Uncertainty Multiplier

extra_variant.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's extra variant type.

homing.description: If true, the projectile homes in to the nearest entity
homing.title: Homing

inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in air
inertia.title: Inertia

potion_effect.title: Potion Effect

power.title: Power

semi_random_diff_damage.description: If true, damage will be randomized based on damage and speed
semi_random_diff_damage.title: Semi Random Diff Damage

shoot_sound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile is shot

uncertainty_multiplier.title: Uncertainty Multiplier

remove_child_entities.description: If true, all entities linked to this entity in a child relationship (eg. leashed) will also be despawned.
remove_child_entities.title: Remove Child Entities

add_items.description: Loot table with items to add to the player's inventory upon successful interaction.
add_items.title: Add Items

cooldown.description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with again.
cooldown.title: Cooldown

hurt_item.description: The amount of damage the item will take when used to interact with this entity. A value of 0 means the item won't lose durability.
hurt_item.title: Hurt Item

interact_text.description: Text to show when the player is able to interact in this way with this entity when playing with Touch-screen controls.
interact_text.title: Interact Text

on_interact.description: Event to fire when the interaction occurs.
on_interact.title: On Interact

particle_on_start.description: Particle effect that will be triggered at the start of the interaction.
particle_on_start.title: Particle On Start

particle_offset_towards_interactor.description: Whether or not the particle will appear closer to who performed the interaction.
particle_offset_towards_interactor.title: Particle Offset Towards Interactor

particle_type.description: The type of particle that will be spawned.
particle_type.title: Particle Type

particle_y_offset.description: Will offset the particle this amount in the y direction.
particle_y_offset.title: Particle Y Offset

play_sounds.description: List of sounds to play when the interaction occurs.
play_sounds.title: Play Sounds

spawn_entities.description: List of entities to spawn when the interaction occurs.
spawn_entities.title: Spawn Entities

spawn_items.description: Loot table with items to drop on the ground upon successful interaction.
spawn_items.title: Spawn Items

table.description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.
table.title: Table

swing.description: If true, the player will do the 'swing' animation when interacting with this entity.
swing.title: Swing

transform_to_item.description: The item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue
transform_to_item.title: Transform To Item

use_item.description: If true, the interaction will use an item.
use_item.title: Use Item

additional_slots_per_strength.description: Number of slots that this entity can gain per extra strength
additional_slots_per_strength.title: Additional Slots Per Strength

can_be_siphoned_from.description: If true, the contents of this inventory can be removed by a hopper
can_be_siphoned_from.title: Can Be Siphoned From

container_type.description: Type of container this entity has. Can be horse, minecart_chest, minecart_hopper, inventory, container or hopper
container_type.title: Container Type

inventory_size.description: Number of slots the container has
inventory_size.title: Inventory Size

private.description: If true, only the entity can access the inventory
private.title: Private

restrict_to_owner.description: If true, the entity's inventory can only be accessed by its owner or itself
restrict_to_owner.title: Restrict To Owner

can_be_stolen.description: If true, players can leash this entity even if it is already leashed to another mob.
can_be_stolen.title: Can Be Stolen

hard_distance.description: Distance in blocks at which the leash stiffens, restricting movement.
hard_distance.title: Hard Distance

max_distance.description: Distance in blocks at which the leash breaks.
max_distance.title: Max Distance

on_leash.description: Event to call when this entity is leashed.
on_leash.title: On Leash

on_unleash.description: Event to call when this entity is unleashed.
on_unleash.title: On Unleash

soft_distance.description: Distance in blocks at which the 'spring' effect starts acting to keep this entity close to the entity that leashed it.
soft_distance.title: Soft Distance

items.title: Range: A
items.description: The first value of the range

items.title: Range: B
items.description: The second value of the range

FBC.description: Defines the behavior when another entity looks at this entity.

allow_invulnerable.description: If true, invulnerable entities (e.g. Players in creative mode) are considered valid targets.
allow_invulnerable.title: Allow Invulnerable

filters.description: Defines the entities that can trigger this component

look_cooldown.title: TODO Title

look_event.description: The event identifier to run when the entities specified in filters look at this entity
look_event.title: TODO Title

mAllowInvulnerable.description: If true, invulnerable entities (e.g. Players in creative mode) are considered valid targets
mAllowInvulnerable.title: TODO Title

searchRadius.description: Maximum distance this entity will look for another entity looking at it

setTarget.description: If true, this entity will set the attack target as the entity that looked at it

search_radius.description: Maximum distance this entity will look for another entity looking at it.

set_target.description: If true, this entity will set the attack target as the entity that looked at it.

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

search_height.description: Height in blocks from the owner the pet can be to sleep with owner.
search_height.title: Search Height

search_range.description: The distance in blocks from the owner the pet can be to sleep with owner.
search_range.title: Search Range

FGE.description: Allows the mob to pick up items on the ground.
FGE.title: Pickup Items 1.16.0

can_pickup_any_item.description: If true, the mob can pickup any item
can_pickup_any_item.title: Can Pickup Any Item

can_pickup_to_hand_or_equipment.description: If true, the mob can pickup items to its hand or armor slots
can_pickup_to_hand_or_equipment.title: Can Pickup To Hand Or Equipment

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob will look for items to pick up
max_dist.title: Max Dist

pickup_based_on_chance.description: If true, depending on the difficulty, there is a random chance that the mob may not be able to pickup items
pickup_based_on_chance.title: Pickup Based On Chance

track_target.description: If true, this mob will chase after the target as long as it's a valid target
track_target.title: Track Target

FGF.description: Allows a mob to randomly fly around
FGF.title: Random Fly 1.16.0

avoid_damage_blocks.description: UNDOCUMENTATED
avoid_damage_blocks.title: UNDOCUMENTATED

can_land_on_trees.description: If true, the mob can stop flying and land on a tree instead of the ground
can_land_on_trees.title: Can Land On Trees

xz_dist.description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
xz_dist.title: Xz Dist

y_dist.description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
y_dist.title: Y Dist

FGG.description: Allows the mob to hover around randomly, close to the surface
FGG.title: Random Hover 1.16.0

interval.description: A random value to determine when to randomly move somewhere. This has a 1/interval chance to choose this goal
interval.title: Interval

xz_dist.description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
xz_dist.title: Xz Dist

y_dist.description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
y_dist.title: Y Dist

y_offset.description: Height in blocks to add to the selected target position
y_offset.title: Y Offset

FGH.description: Allows the mob to randomly sit and look around for a duration. Note: Must have a sitting animation set up to use this.
FGH.title: Random Look Around And Sit 1.16.0

max_look_count.description: The max amount of unique looks a mob will have while looking around.
max_look_count.title: Max Look Count

max_look_time.description: The max amount of time (in ticks) a mob will stay looking at a direction while looking around.
max_look_time.title: Max Look Time

min_look_count.description: The min amount of unique looks a mob will have while looking around.
min_look_count.title: Min Look Count

min_look_time.description: The min amount of time (in ticks) a mob will stay looking at a direction while looking around.
min_look_time.title: Min Look Time

probability.description: The probability of randomly looking around/sitting.
probability.title: Probability

FGI.description: Allows the mob to stay at a certain level when in liquid.
FGI.title: Rise To Liquid Level 1.16.0

base_delay.description: Amount of time in seconds before starting this step

event.description: The event to send to the entity

sound_event.description: The sound event to play when this step happens

FGJ.description: Allows the mob to send an event to another mob.
FGJ.title: Send Event 1.16.0

cast_duration.description: Time in seconds for the entire event sending process

FHA.description: Allows the mob to stay at a certain level when in liquid.
FHA.title: Stalk And Pounce On Target 1.16.0

interest_time.description: The amount of time the mob will be interested before pouncing. This happens when the mob is within range of pouncing
interest_time.title: Interest Time

leap_distance.description: The distance in blocks the mob jumps in the direction of its target
leap_distance.title: Leap Distance

leap_height.description: The height in blocks the mob jumps when leaping at its target
leap_height.title: Leap Height

max_stalk_dist.description: The maximum distance away a target can be before the mob gives up on stalking
max_stalk_dist.title: Max Stalk Dist

pounce_max_dist.description: The maximum distance away from the target in blocks to begin pouncing at the target
pounce_max_dist.title: Pounce Max Dist

set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player
set_persistent.title: Set Persistent

stalk_speed.description: The movement speed in which you stalk your target
stalk_speed.title: Stalk Speed

strike_dist.description: The max distance away from the target when landing from the pounce that will still result in damaging the target
strike_dist.title: Strike Dist

stuck_time.description: The amount of time the mob will be stuck if they fail and land on a block they can be stuck on
stuck_time.title: Stuck Time

FHB.description: Allows the mob to stay at a certain level when in liquid.
FHB.title: Stroll Towards Village 1.16.0

cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again
cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time

goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

search_range.description: The distance in blocks to search for points inside villages. If <= 0, find the closest village regardless of distance.
search_range.title: Search Range

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
speed_multiplier.title: Speed Multiplier

start_chance.description: This is the chance that the mob will start this goal, from 0 to 1
start_chance.title: Start Chance

FHJ.description: Returns true when the subject Player entity has opened a container.

FIC.title: Filters Has Ranged Weapon 1.16.100
FIC.description: Returns true when the subject entity is holding a ranged weapon like a bow or crossbow.

FID.title: Filters Has Target 1.16.100
FID.description: Returns true if the subject entity has a valid target.

FIE.title: Filters In Nether 1.16.100
FIE.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in Nether.

FIH.description: Returns true if the subject entity leashed to the calling entity.

FII.title: Filters Is Persistent 1.16.100
FII.description: Tests if the subject's persistence matches the bool value passed in.

FIJ.title: Filters Is Sleeping 1.16.100
FIJ.description: Tests whether the Subject is sleeping.

FJA.title: Filters Light Level 1.16.100
FJA.description: Tests is the mob is outside of the specified light level range (0, 16).

FJB.title: Filters Random Chance 1.16.100
FJB.description: Returns true if the random chance rolls 0 out of a specified max range.

FJC.title: Filters Rider Count 1.16.100
FJC.description: Returns the number of riders on this entity.

FJD.title: Filters Surface Mob 1.16.100
FJD.description: Tests if the subject is a surface mob.

FJE.title: Filters Trusts 1.16.100
FJE.description: Returns true if the subject is trusted by entity.

FJF.description: Tests the current weather in the dimension against a provided weather value.
